item.title: Blog Artikel - 2023
item.description: Azure DevOps 2022 auf Server Core installierenSince Azure DevOps Server 2022 finally supports a deployment on Server Core, I can replace another GUI Server in my LAB. In this write up, I will show you all the steps to get it up and running in your environment. To have a quick peek at the service, you will get away with a 2 CPU, 4 GB memory, 15 GB hard drive VM (not using the Code Search feature).
